content:
# We have successfully harvested 20 additional coal, updating our inventory to `{'coal': 20, 'iron-ore': 21, 'iron-plate': 5}`.
# With sufficient coal and iron ore now available, we can proceed to supply all four furnaces.

# Let's distribute 4 pieces of coal into each of the four furnaces to ensure they can all operate.
for furnace in get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace}):
    insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=4)  # Insert 4 coal into each furnace.

# Next, we will insert 5 iron ore into each of the four furnaces to maximize their usage.
for furnace in get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace}):
    insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 iron ore into each furnace.

# After these actions, we will check the updated inventory and the statuses of the furnaces once more.
print(f"Updated Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
print(f"Furnace statuses: {[inspect_inventory(furnace) for furnace in get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace})]}")
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
